---
title: "Exploratory factor analysis"
author: "Deon de Bruin"
---

```{r}
#| warning: FALSE
#| message: FALSE
library(lavaan)
library(flexplavaan)
library(psychTools)
library(psych)
library(tidyverse)

scree(bfi[, c(1:5, 16:20)])

fa.parallel(bfi[, c(1:5, 16:20)])

fa(bfi[, c(1:5, 16:20)], nfactors = 2)

fa(bfi[, c(1:5, 16:20)], nfactors = 3)

bfi %>% 
  select(1:5, 16:20) %>% 
  scree()

bfi %>% 
  select(1:5, 16:20) %>% 
  fa.parallel()

myfa <- bfi %>% 
  select(1:5, 16:20) %>% 
  fa(nfactors = 2)

print(myfa$loadings, cut = 0)

data.frame(myfa$complexity) %>% 
  arrange(myfa.complexity)
```
